ctx: intros y l x z Hxy Hyz.
exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

original: intros y l x z Hxy Hyz. induction l as [| a]. - apply star_trans with y; auto. - destruct Hxy as [u [Hxu Huy]]. apply taus_weak with u. + apply weak_tau with (Red (L a)). * auto. * apply weak_refl. + auto.
